items.sentence: From the top of that tall building, you can easily see the city.

Tom doesn't know the difference between a fable and a fairytale.
The language course Tom designed is more confusing than helpful.
Tom was the only one who seemed to notice that Mary was missing.

I wanted to hug you, but I knew it would embarrass you if I did.

There's a little restaurant on Park Street where we used to eat.
I don't believe the weather will change for the worse next week.
It isn't till we lose our health that we realize its true value.
